original_text: Go at once to Paddan Aram, to the house of your mother’s father Bethuel. Take a wife for yourself there, from among the daughters of Laban, your mother’s brother.
korean_text: 일어나 밧단아람으로 가서 네 외조부 브두엘의 집에 이르러 거기서 네 외삼촌 라반의 딸 중에서 아내를 맞이하라

sentences.original_text: Go at once to Paddan Aram
to the house of your mother's father Bethuel
Take a wife for yourself there
from among the daughters of Laban
